text: Joe Greenwald was a equestrian from USA. Greenwald competed at the 1920 Summer Olympics. He was born on 2 December 1888 and died on 19 May 1986.Joe Greenwald == References == == Other websites == * Category:1888 births Category:1986 deaths Category:American equestrians Category:Olympians for the United States Category:American show jumping riders Category:Sportspeople from Iowa Category:Olympic equestrians for the United States
title: Joe Greenwald
